Loan Number.description: Unique identifier for the loan. The count of this value is often referred to as units. When users ask a question regarding the count of loans you should count this column

Branch Code.description: Code representing which Branch the loan belongs to

Loan Officer.description: Name of the loan officer who owns the loan

Loan Amount.description: Amount of the loan. The sum of this value is often referred to as volume

Started Date.description: Date when the loan process started

Pre Approval Date.description: Date when the loan was pre-approved. Loans with a non null pre approval date are referred to as 'pre approvals', 'pre apps', or 'preapps'

Has Pre Approval.description: a binary value indicating if a loan has been pre approved or not. A value of 1 means that the loan does have a pre approval

Application Date.description: Date when the loan application was submitted. Loans with a non null application date are referred to as 'apps' or 'applications'

Has Application.description: a binary value indicating if a loan has an application or not. A value of 1 means that the loan does have an application

Lock Date.description: Date when the interest rate was locked. Loans with a non null lock date are referred to as 'locks'

Has Rate Lock.description: a binary value indicating if a loan has a rate lock or not. A value of 1 means that the loan does have a rate lock

Closing Date.description: Date when the loan closing occurred. If this date is not null then the loan is referred to as 'closed'

Is Closed.description: a binary value indicating if a loan is cloed or not. A value of 1 means that the loan is closed

Last Completed Milestone.description: Last milestone completed in the loan process

Underwriter Name.description: Name of the underwriter handling the loan

Buyers Agent Name.description: Name of the buyer"s agent for the loan

Subject Property State.description: State where the subject property is located

Subject Property City.description: City where the subject property is located

Subject Property Type.description: Type of the subject property (e.g., Condominium, 1 Unit)

Subject Property Purchase Price.description: Purchase price of the subject property

Subject Property Appraised Value.description: Appraised value of the subject property

Intended Property Use.description: Intended use of the property (e.g., Primary Residence)

Loan Program Type.description: Type of the loan program (e.g., Conventional, FHA)

Loan Term.description: Term of the loan in months

Loan Type.description: Type of the loan (e.g., Conventional, FHA)

Denial Date.description: Date that the loan was denied on if applicable. Loans with a non null denial date are referred to as 'denials' or 'denied'

Lead Detail.description: Category of the lead associated with this loan (e.g. referral)

Outside Lead Source.description: Source of lead outside the company

Rate Lock Expiration Date.description: Date when the rate lock expires

Greenlight Approval Date.description: Date when greenlight approval was obtained. Loans with a non null greenlight approval date are referred to as 'greenlights'

Primary Account Id.description: ID associated with the primary borrower"s account

Front End Net.description: The net profit received from this loan prior to selling the loan on the secondary market

Back End Net.description: The net profit received from this loan after selling to the secondary market

Loan Level Expenses.description: The total fixed expenses for this loan. Includes costs such as credit pulls, verification of employment, and price variance

Loan Level Revenue.description: The total fixed revenue for this loan. Includes costs such as credit pulls, verification of employment, and price variance

Commission Expenses.description: The total amount of money paid towards commission on this loan

Total Profit.description: The total profit made on this loan. It is equivalent to [Front End Net] + [Back End Net] + [Loan Level Expenses] + [Loan Level Revenue] + [Commission Expenses]
